description: A pixel sorting effect that manipulates the pixels based on lightness, hue, and other parameters.

paramDescriptions.threshold_min: Controls the minimum pixel brightness for sorting.
paramDescriptions.threshold_max: Controls the maximum pixel brightness for sorting.
paramDescriptions.angle: Adjusts the direction of pixel sorting.
paramDescriptions.contrast: Changes the contrast of the sorted pixels.
paramDescriptions.saturation: Adjusts the saturation of the sorted pixels.
paramDescriptions.resolution: Changes the resolution of the sorted pixels.
paramDescriptions.noise_amount: Adds noise to the sorted pixels.
paramDescriptions.noise_scale: Adjusts the scale of the noise pattern.
paramDescriptions.sorting_direction: Sets the sorting direction: 0 for vertical, 1 for horizontal.
paramDescriptions.sorting_style: Sort based on: 0 = Hue, 1 = Saturation, 2 = Lightness.
